title: AUNAL
description: Lab website for AUNAL lab at Ajou University, South Korea

home.title: AUNAL @ Ajou University of Medicine, South Korea
home.description: We are conducting research in the Department of Neurology and the Convergence Medicine Department's Dry lab at Ajou University School of Medicine, utilizing AI technology to analyze Neuroimage and Neurosignal data. We would appreciate your interest in our work :)
home.interests: Applied Machine Learning & Deep Learning | NeuroImage & NeuroSignal Data Analysis | Graph Neural Network for Medical Image
